Sentencas: The effects of coating materials on Cr-containing alloy separators were examined for preventing the degradation of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy

Sentencas: Various oxide materials (YSZ, Y2O3, La2O3, LaAlO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3, LSCO) were coated on the alloys, and investigated for the degree of Cr-poisoning using a half-cell measurement method.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy

Sentencas: In these oxides, (La,Sr)CoO3 coating was found to be effective for preventing the degradation.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy

Sentencas: The LSCO-coated alloy was analyzed by X-ray diffractometry (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM) and energy dispersion X-ray (EDX) analysis.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy

Sentencas: The interface between the cathode and the electrolyte was examined by electron probe micro analysis.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy

Sentencas: Consequently, it was proved that a LSCO coating controls the growth of the Cr2O3 oxide layer on the Cr-containing alloy surface.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy

Sentencas: And the effects of LSCO coating were further confirmed by a single-cell stack test.
Titulo: Prevention of SOFC cathode degradation in contact with Cr-containing alloy
